titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Allowance for Compensation of Interns in House Appropriations Committee Offices for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for House of Representatives, Allowance for Compensation of Interns in House Appropriations Committee Offices for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for compensating interns who work for the House Appropriations Committee.
